alert.note: Alert for Clark (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 15 at 9:05PM CST until December 15 at 9:30PM CST by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: The National Weather Service in La Crosse has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Clark County in central Wisconsin... * Until 930 PM CST. * At 904 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Bloomer to 7 miles south of Stanley to near Neillsville, moving northeast at 75 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Thorp around 910 PM CST. Colby around 930 PM CST. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include County K And Capital Road, Mead Lake, Atwood, County O And Sterling Avenue, Eidsvold, Longwood and Curtiss. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CST for central Wisconsin. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
